text: 1.11-12 Epe 1.11, 1.18-19, 3.16, 4.2 Pen abe nop agnopul, ne kɨles tɨmel yɨbɨl ne ak dɨl nɨbop ñek, kɨles gɨl jak yenɨgabɨm. Jak mɨdɨl, mɨŋel ogɨnap apek gos anɨb ak ma nɨŋɨd, wog ne malɨk gɨl gɨñɨnɨgabɨm. Ne nɨbop gek gɨtep yɨbɨl gɨnɨmɨb tek lup ak nɨm, binɨb ne okok tap teplep ne kɨlop aglɨl ñɨnɨgab ak dɨnɨgabɨm. Chɨnop dek binɨb ne mɨdɨl mɨlek ne nab ayaŋ mɨdobun agɨl, gos sek mɨdɨl Bapi nop tep agɨlɨg yenɨmɨb.
